structure.unit: OFFENSES AGAINST PUBLIC HEALTH AND SAFETY

law.catch_line: Penalty for violation of KRS 438.282 or 438.284.
law.text: Any person who knowingly violates KRS 438.282 or 438.284 shall be liable for a civil penalty of not more than ten thousand dollars ($10,000) per violation.
law.history: Created 2008 Ky. Acts ch. 102, sec. 6, effective July 15, 2008.
